channel.title: How do i?
channel.description: Im looking to make a server just for me so i can do as i please! can anyone explain to me how to do that? ALSO im looking for a good coder to help me make a server and host it! (i cant host so i need a hoster) The coder will become co owner and if the coder cannot be the host, The person that hosts the server will also have owner rights!

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @bobsisland bobsisland
item.description:
@bobsisland wrote:

“How was i NO speaking english” Exactly that is how. You are speaking english not that good, thought but i understand it which is good enough for me. Just next time write your question in the subject instead of “…”

Read full topic

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @Chaostheory Chaostheory
item.description:
@Chaostheory wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:266900”][quote author=Chaostheory link=topic=352409.msg2703054#msg2703054 date=1236779428]
Im looking to make a server just for me so i can do as i please!
can anyone explain to me how to do that?
ALSO im looking for a good coder to help me make a server and host it! (i cant host so i need a hoster) The coder will become co owner and if the coder cannot be the host, The person that hosts the server will also have owner rights!
[/quote]
We are not a Spoon-feeding community! Speak English and No.[/quote]
Umm how was i no speaking english? that is probally better english then you would ever speak so do not comment on things that you do not fully unserstand

Read full topic

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @landonsnow1 landonsnow1
item.description:
@landonsnow1 wrote:

[quote=“ollie123, post:4, topic:266900”]If someone else programmed it, and someone else hosted it, how would it belong to you?

Im looking to make a server just for me so i can do as i please!
can anyone explain to me how to do that?
ALSO im looking for a good coder to help me make a server and host it! (i cant host so i need a hoster) The coder will become co owner and if the coder cannot be the host, The person that hosts the server will also have owner rights!

We are not a Spoon-feeding community! Speak English and No.

^ This guy speaks the truth. ^[/quote]
all these ppl are right. i have a server hoster, but i code the servers myself and i add stuff here and there, i also give proper credit to the hoster. so plz start learning how to code and do these things for yourself. if i can do it so can you. i have had almost no java exp yet im able to completely manage and code a server to my advantage, i can now also code because of the moparscape community. so if you need help with something post it here, just try to atleast do some of the stuff yourself.

Read full topic
